<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Duskwalker](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3139)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Duskwalkers are infused with the same energies as [psychopomp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=458). These ashen scions are reborn in the mortal [Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26) to guard the cycle of life and death.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Duskwalker_Ghost_Hunter.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Duskwalker Ghost Hunter](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3139)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=751" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 266 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27) (2), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 (22 against prey)

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +10 

+1 status to all saves vs. [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 56

</row>

**Immunities**
effects that would transform their body or soul to an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722)

**Resistances**
[void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510) 2

**Ghost Dodge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The duskwalker is targeted by a Strike or spell; **Effect** The duskwalker gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, resistance 5 to [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=737) damage, and increases their resistance to [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510) damage to 5, all against the triggering attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +14 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 slashing

**Ghost Hunter**   The duskwalker's weapons have the benefits of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840) property rune on attacks against [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=632) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722).

**Spirit Hunter** <actions string="Single Action" />  The duskwalker designates a single creature they can observe as their prey. The duskwalker gains a +2 circumstance bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) checks, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) checks, and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) checks against their prey and to any check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) about it, and deal an additional 2 spirit damage with all weapon Strikes against their prey. These effects last until the duskwalker uses Spirit Hunter again.

**Spirit Shot** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Requirements** The duskwalker has designated a creature as their prey using Spirit Hunter; **Effect** The duskwalker makes two ranged Strikes against their prey. If both Strikes hit, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

</column>
